title: Participate in Fair Use/Fair Dealing Week!
content:
Last Updated on February 20, 2026, 10:46 am ET

Fair Use/Fair Dealing Week is February 23–27, 2026! This is the 13th annual celebration of the balance in copyright law, promoting further progress, and accommodating freedom of speech and expression that fair use and fair dealing represent.

Let ARL and CARL know what your library is planning! Submit your library’s events, blog posts, and other resources using this form or by emailing
creator: Katherine Klosek, ARL & Katherine McColgan, CARL
sourceTitle: Public Policy Archives — Association of Research Libraries
